quotation: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي أَنْزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَاءِ مَاءً فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِ نَبَاتَ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ
transliteration: wahuwa llaḏī ʔanzala mina s-samāʔi māʔan faʔaḵrajnā bihi nabāta kulli šayʔin
translation: And it is He Who sent down rain from the sky. And with it have We brought forth germination of all things;
example_text: ‏وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي أَنْزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَاءِ مَاءً فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِ نَبَاتَ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ‎wahuwa llaḏī ʔanzala mina s-samāʔi māʔan faʔaḵrajnā bihi nabāta kulli šayʔinAnd it is He Who sent down rain from the sky. And with it have We brought forth germination of all things;

quotation: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ لَكُمْ مَّا فِي ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ ٱسْتَوَىٰ إِلَىٰ ٱلسَّمَاءِ فَسَوَّىٰهُنَّ سَبْعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٍ
transliteration: huwa llaḏī ḵalaqa lakum mmā fī l-ʔarḍi jamīʕan ṯumma stawā ʔilā s-samāʔi fasawwāhunna sabʕa samāwātin
translation: It is He Who created for you all what is on earth. Again he directed himself towards the heaven and made thereof seven heavens.
example_text: ‏هُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ لَكُمْ مَّا فِي ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ ٱسْتَوَىٰ إِلَىٰ ٱلسَّمَاءِ فَسَوَّىٰهُنَّ سَبْعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٍ‎‎huwa llaḏī ḵalaqa lakum mmā fī l-ʔarḍi jamīʕan ṯumma stawā ʔilā s-samāʔi fasawwāhunna sabʕa samāwātinIt is He Who created for you all what is on earth. Again he directed himself towards the heaven and made thereof seven heavens.

quotation: فَقُلْتُ ٱسْتَغْفِرُوا رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُ كَانَ غَفَّارًا يُّرْسِلِ ٱلسَّمَاءَ عَلَيْكُمْ مِّدْرَارًا وَّيُمْدِدْكُمْ بِأَمْوَالٍ وَّبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَلْ لَّكُمْ جَنَّاتٍ وَّيَجْعَلْ لَّكُمْ أَنْهَارًا
transliteration: faqultu staḡfirū rabbakum ʔinnahu kāna ḡaffāran yyursili s-samāʔa ʕalaykum mmidrāran wwayumdidkum biʔamwālin wwabanīna wayajʕal llakum jannātin wwayajʕal llakum ʔanhāran
translation: So I said, "Ask your Lord for forgiveness! He surely is forgiving. He shall send unto you profusely the produce of the sky. And He shall enrich you with wealth and children and make for you gardens and make for you rivers."
example_text: ‏فَقُلْتُ ٱسْتَغْفِرُوا رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُ كَانَ غَفَّارًا يُّرْسِلِ ٱلسَّمَاءَ عَلَيْكُمْ مِّدْرَارًا وَّيُمْدِدْكُمْ بِأَمْوَالٍ وَّبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَلْ لَّكُمْ جَنَّاتٍ وَّيَجْعَلْ لَّكُمْ أَنْهَارًا‎faqultu staḡfirū rabbakum ʔinnahu kāna ḡaffāran yyursili s-samāʔa ʕalaykum mmidrāran wwayumdidkum biʔamwālin wwabanīna wayajʕal llakum jannātin wwayajʕal llakum ʔanhāranSo I said, "Ask your Lord for forgiveness! He surely is forgiving. He shall send unto you profusely the produce of the sky. And He shall enrich you with wealth and children and make for you gardens and make for you rivers."

quotation: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ فِي ٱلسَّمَاءِ بُرُوجًا وَّجَعَلَ فِيهَا سِرَٰجًا وَّقَمَرًا مُّنِيرًا
transliteration: tabāraka llaḏī jaʕala fī s-samāʔi burūjan wwajaʕala fīhā sirājan wwaqamaran mmunīran
translation: Blessed is He Who made asterisms in the heavens and [also] made therein a lamp and a luminous moon.
example_text: ‏تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ فِي ٱلسَّمَاءِ بُرُوجًا وَّجَعَلَ فِيهَا سِرَٰجًا وَّقَمَرًا مُّنِيرًا‎tabāraka llaḏī jaʕala fī s-samāʔi burūjan wwajaʕala fīhā sirājan wwaqamaran mmunīranBlessed is He Who made asterisms in the heavens and [also] made therein a lamp and a luminous moon.

quotation: ءَأَمِنْتُمْ مَّنْ فِي ٱلسَّمَاءِ أَنْ يَّخْسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَمُورُ
transliteration: ʔaʔamintum mman fī s-samāʔi ʔan yyaḵsifa bikumu l-ʔarḍa faʔiḏā hiya tamūru
translation: Are you [so] certain that He Who is in Heaven will cause not the earth, when it would be swaying in tumult, to swallow you up?
example_text: ‏ءَأَمِنْتُمْ مَّنْ فِي ٱلسَّمَاءِ أَنْ يَّخْسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَمُورُ‎ʔaʔamintum mman fī s-samāʔi ʔan yyaḵsifa bikumu l-ʔarḍa faʔiḏā hiya tamūruAre you [so] certain that He Who is in Heaven will cause not the earth, when it would be swaying in tumult, to swallow you up?

quotation: وَلَٰكِنْ بَعْدَ أَنْ أَسْخَطَ آبَاؤُنَا إِلَٰهَ ٱلسَّمَاءِ  […]
transliteration: walākin baʕda ʔan ʔasḵaṭa ʔābāʔunā ʔilāha s-samāʔi  […]
translation: But after our fathers made the god of Heaven angry  […]
example_text: ‏وَلَٰكِنْ بَعْدَ أَنْ أَسْخَطَ آبَاؤُنَا إِلَٰهَ ٱلسَّمَاءِ  […]‎walākin baʕda ʔan ʔasḵaṭa ʔābāʔunā ʔilāha s-samāʔi  […]But after our fathers made the god of Heaven angry  […]

quotation: مَنْ كَانَ يَظُنُّ أَنْ لَنْ يَنْصُرَهُ ٱللهُ فِي ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْآخِرَةِ فَلْيَمْدُدْ بِسَبَبٍ إِلَىٰ ٱلسَّمَاءِ ثُمَّ لْيَقْطَعْ فَلْيَنْظُرْ هَلْ يُذْهِبَنَّ كَيْدُهُ مَا يَغِيظُ
transliteration: man kāna yaẓunnu ʔan lan yanṣurahu llāhu fī d-dunyā wal-ʔāḵirati falyamdud bisababin ʔilā l-ssamāʔi ṯumma lyaqṭaʕ falyanẓur hal yuḏhibanna kayduhu mā yaḡīẓu
translation: He who thinks that God will not support him in this world and the hereafter: Then let him stretch a rope upto the vault and let him strangle himself. Then let him see if his strategy makes what is enraging [him so much] go away.
example_text: ‏مَنْ كَانَ يَظُنُّ أَنْ لَنْ يَنْصُرَهُ ٱللهُ فِي ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْآخِرَةِ فَلْيَمْدُدْ بِسَبَبٍ إِلَىٰ ٱلسَّمَاءِ ثُمَّ لْيَقْطَعْ فَلْيَنْظُرْ هَلْ يُذْهِبَنَّ كَيْدُهُ مَا يَغِيظُ‎man kāna yaẓunnu ʔan lan yanṣurahu llāhu fī d-dunyā wal-ʔāḵirati falyamdud bisababin ʔilā l-ssamāʔi ṯumma lyaqṭaʕ falyanẓur hal yuḏhibanna kayduhu mā yaḡīẓuHe who thinks that God will not support him in this world and the hereafter: Then let him stretch a rope upto the vault and let him strangle himself. Then let him see if his strategy makes what is enraging [him so much] go away.

quotation: وَيُمْسِكُ ٱلسَّمَاءَ أَنْ تَقَعَ عَلَىٰ ٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِهِ
transliteration: wayumsiku s-samāʔa ʔan taqaʕa ʕalā l-ʔarḍi ʔillā biʔiḏnihi
translation: And He holds up the firmament lest it fall upon the earth but by His leave.
example_text: ‏وَيُمْسِكُ ٱلسَّمَاءَ أَنْ تَقَعَ عَلَىٰ ٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِهِ‎wayumsiku s-samāʔa ʔan taqaʕa ʕalā l-ʔarḍi ʔillā biʔiḏnihiAnd He holds up the firmament lest it fall upon the earth but by His leave.
